parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: First side: 0 = Full length 1 = Intermittent 2 = Staggered

parameters.name: Size1
parameters.description: Size of fillet on first side

parameters.name: Length1
parameters.description: Length of fillet on first side

parameters.name: PenetrationType1
parameters.description: First side: 0 = Full penetration 1 = Partial penetration 2 = No penetration

parameters.name: PenetrationValue1
parameters.description: If penetrationType1 is set to 1 (Partial penetration), then set its value

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Pitch, if Intermittent or Staggered on both sides

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Second side: 0= Full length 1 = Intermittent 2= Staggered

parameters.name: Size2
parameters.description: Size of fillet on second side

parameters.name: Length2
parameters.description: Length of fillet on second side

parameters.name: PenetrationType2
parameters.description: Second side: 0 = Full penetration 1 = Partial penetration 2 = No penetration

parameters.name: PenetrationValue2
parameters.description: If penetrationType2 is set to 1 (Partial penetration), then set its value

parameters.name: Flag
parameters.description: 0 = One-sided and no tangent propagation 1 = Two-sided 2 = Tangent propagation 3 = Two-sided and tangent propagation

parameters.name: EdgeNum1
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on first side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge1
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on first side

parameters.name: EdgeNum2
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on second side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge2
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on second side

parameters.name: FaceSet1
parameters.description: Array of side 1 faces whose intersecting edges get fillet beads

parameters.name: FaceSet2
parameters.description: Array of side 2 faces whose intersecting edges get fillet beads

title: IFeatureManager.InsertFilletBeadFeature3
description: Inserts fillet weld bead features for the specified face sets.
signature:

   System.Int16
Type1
,
   System.Double
Size1
,
   System.Double
Length1
,
   System.Int16
PenetrationType1
,
   System.Double

,

,

,
   System.Double
Size2
,
   System.Double
Length2
,
   System.Int16
PenetrationType2
,
   System.Double
PenetrationValue2
,
   System.Int32
Flag
,
   System.Int32
EdgeNum1
,
   System.Object
DeSelEdge1
,
   System.Int32
EdgeNum2
,
   System.Object
DeSelEdge2
,
   System.Object
FaceSet1
,
   System.Object
FaceSet2
)

parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: First side: 0 = Full length 1 = Intermittent 2 = Staggered

parameters.name: Size1
parameters.description: Size of fillet on first side

parameters.name: Length1
parameters.description: Length of fillet on first side

parameters.name: PenetrationType1
parameters.description: First side: 0 = Full penetration 1 = Partial penetration 2 = No penetration

parameters.name: PenetrationValue1
parameters.description: If penetrationType1 is set to 1 (Partial penetration), then set its value

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Pitch, if Intermittent or Staggered on both sides

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Second side: 0= Full length 1 = Intermittent 2= Staggered

parameters.name: Size2
parameters.description: Size of fillet on second side

parameters.name: Length2
parameters.description: Length of fillet on second side

parameters.name: PenetrationType2
parameters.description: Second side: 0 = Full penetration 1 = Partial penetration 2 = No penetration

parameters.name: PenetrationValue2
parameters.description: If penetrationType2 is set to 1 (Partial penetration), then set its value

parameters.name: Flag
parameters.description: 0 = One-sided and no tangent propagation 1 = Two-sided 2 = Tangent propagation 3 = Two-sided and tangent propagation

parameters.name: EdgeNum1
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on first side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge1
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on first side

parameters.name: EdgeNum2
parameters.description: Number of intersecting edges on second side

parameters.name: DeSelEdge2
parameters.description: Array indicating if intersecting edges are selected (0) or deselected (1) on second side

parameters.name: FaceSet1
parameters.description: Array of side 1 faces whose intersecting edges get fillet beads

parameters.name: FaceSet2
parameters.description: Array of side 2 faces whose intersecting edges get fillet beads

remarks: This interface specifies two face arrays, one for each side of a part feature. The fillet bead is applied to the edges where each face intersects for each array specified.
